bradleyross.library.database

Class ExtrasRegistration

  • java.lang.Object
    • bradleyross.library.database.ExtrasRegistration

  • public class ExtrasRegistration
extends Object
    Provide for registration of DatabaseExtras subclasses.
    Author:
    Bradley Ross
    See Also:
    DatabaseExtras

        Primarily for diagnostics.
